message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at $9,000?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500 to make this work. It's a fair price, considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $10,250. Can you consider this price?
